heading: Sunday
text: Valley fog burning off to sunshine, mixing with clouds in the evening. Warmer. Highs in the low 80s.
Valley fog burning off to sunshine, mixing with clouds in the evening. Warmer. Highs in the low 80s.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Some evening clouds, then clearing and mild. Areas of river valley fog. Lows in the upper 40s to mid 50s.

heading: Monday
text: Valley fog burning off to sunshine. Warm. Highs in the upper 70s to around 80.
Valley fog burning off to sunshine. Warm. Highs in the upper 70s to around 80.
